text: today is all about asparagus delicious
creamy asparagus soup you may remember
that I made cream of broccoli soup a
while back and today's recipe is
basically that exact same recipe but
replacing the broccoli with asparagus so
I'm starting with 1 pound of asparagus
once you get rid of the tough ends just
hop the asparagus into say 1-inch pieces
let's just cut it all up and start your
cooking in this pot I have a quarter cup
of butter that's been melted add one
onion that's been finely diced saute
until your onion is translucent and
softened that takes about five minutes
when your onion has softened add a
quarter cup of flour this is going to
thicken your soup and make it really
nice and silky now what you want to do
is add the liquids that you're gonna
cook your soup in this is four cups of
chicken broth if you're interested in
having this be vegetarian just use
vegetable broth and then additionally
add a cup of water and bring this to a
boil reduce it to a simmer and then cook
for about 10 minutes that'll allow the
liquid to thicken and it just sort of
infused the flavors a little bit add
your asparagus at this point bring it to
a boil reduce it to a simmer and then
cook it until the asparagus is very very
tender
once your asparagus is nice and tender
you can puree it I'm gonna use this
which is an amazing tool I love an
immersion blender these are great
because you just put them in whatever
pot and turn it on and puree you can
definitely do this in a blender and I
think you probably will get a slightly
finer result like a smoother silkier
result if you do but I just love using
my immersion blender finished with a
little bit of heavy cream this adds a
little bit of richness it's not
necessary if you don't want it that was
a quarter cup
it's super easy you can also use spinach
mushrooms we have lots of different
variations on our site Martha Stewart
comm so you should check it out but
first start by making the asparagus
cream of asparagus soup
lish give it a try
you
